content: > this pattern is available for free on my blog 1 the downloadable pdf listed for sale contains the full pattern including all photo tutorials in one printable file without advertisements learn how to crochet this fun crochet water bottle holder to take on your everyday adventures a water bottle holder is the perfect solution to staying hydrated all while keeping your hands free when you re out on your daily walk or just walking around the grocery store included with this crochet pattern are instructions for two yarn weight options dk and worsted weight and two crochet strap pattern options a stationary strap and an adjustable crochet strap i ve also included instructions for customizing the crochet bottle bag to accommodate different size water bottles choose the right strap option for you wear the water bottle bag on one shoulder or as a crossbody bag **yarn** i ve included instructions for both a dk weight bottle holder and a worsted weight bottle holder instructions are also included to easily adjust the size of your water bottle holder for larger reusable water bottles such as a yeti or hydro flask water bottle bag design is an a crocheted
